title: How much subsidy will Central Scheme to provide Interest Subsidy on education loans get? - Quora

response.answer_text: Central Sector Interest Subsidy Scheme : Under this Scheme Interest Subsidy is given during the moratorium period i.e., Course period plus one year on Education Loan taken from the Scheduled Banks under the Model Education Loan Scheme of Indian Banks Association to students belonging to economically weaker sections whose annual parental income is up to Rs. 4.5 Lakh from all sources. The subsidy is allowed for undergoing recognised Professional/ Technical courses in recognised Institutions in India. This subsidy is allowed only once.

It really depends on your bank.How much interest they are charging.You can see the transactions of your loan account and calculate the interest.That much subsidy you will get. Make sure you calculate interest from 1st April of a year to 31st March of next year(ie.financial year)
Full interest subsidy is available for education loan in India.subsidy is to be claimed every year till completion of course.
